page.title: Stocks Down Slightly; Economic Data Mixed
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks ended slightly lower on Friday as a higher-than-expected jump in U.S. producer prices helped to offset a fall in oil prices and dividend hikes from General Electric Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GE.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GE.N</A> and SBC Communications <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SBC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SBC.N</A>.
